column1: Baby Barnaby's////What I like about Baby Barnaby's is that there are interesting breakfast selections.  Yes
column2: you can get the standard french toast and bacon here
column4: when you can order "pink eggs"?  Pink eggs
column6: are bits of salmon and cheese mixed with scrambled eggs
column7: accompanied by a side of potatoes or toast.  You could also get "Green Eggs
column8: which is my personal favorite--eggs with artichoke hearts and avocado scrambled into it.  The coffee is free here, which I recently discovered.  Orange juice is expensive, as orange juice generally is in restaurants, but it is fresh-squeezed!
